ValidationRule.description: SF-93 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("\\d{5}") or ("\\d{6}"). Example: 99999 or 999999.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s )), ISPICKVAL( Construction_Site_Address__CountryCode__s , "MN") ), NOT( OR( REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("\\d{5}")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("\\d{6}")) ) ), FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Opportunity_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should consist of five or six numbers. Example: 99999 or 999999
